name: festively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has or produces happy and enjoyable feelings suitable for a special occasion: The house was very festively decorated, with balloons, tinsel, and party lights. The group of girls decided to dress festively in spangly gold outfits.
More examplesFewer examplesThe monument was festively illuminated with a constantly changing light show.They have released a new range of festively coloured sleepwear.He baked an enormous, three-layer chocolate cake, with a Santa Claus figure placed festively on top.
